item.title: Report E-2023100262
item.description:
Report E-2023100262

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-12T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: CHESTER
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that one case of nitric acid (un2031) had a release. Contractors confirmed that four of the inner poly one gallon jugs had a loose caps and had released 0.5 gallons of product. Contractors also contained and cleaned up the release.
